name: Space Station Three
description:
Experience the greatest space station simulation available on the market.

Play as the young assistant and face multiple challanges all over Space Station Three.

Can you find the Chef? Will you be able to survive the dangers of outer space?

Yes and no.

[ [ The game might not let you get past the second scene if you're playing on Google Chrome, unfortunately I can't fix it at this point. You'll need Firefox or some other browser to get this big boy to run, sorry! ] ]
